chapters.title: Chapter 7: The Plan for Arad Doman
chapters.info: Eben Hopwil, p. 122—One of the Asha'man. He was about sixteen years old, and skinny. He had a big nose and ears to match. He died at the hands of Aran'gar during the cleansing of saidin near Shadar Logoth. He was bonded as a Warder by Daigian. See also Moseneillin, Daigian.
